title: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India commences engine production at Gujarat plant
description: Powering its 250 cc and above range of two-wheelers, the dedicated engine line is set to serve the global demand, like Thailand, the US, Canada, Europe, Japan, Australia, and Gulf nations, among others.
